name: bubblegum (ty)
description:
note, this uses webgl2 and so it may not work in some browsers

bubblegum

run around and think about bubblegum.

made in a week for the class "prototype studio" at the nyu game center. the theme was an image i'll link later.

controls
- wasd: move
- mouse: look
- shift: run
- space: jump

todo (maybe one day)
- audio w/o clipping
- fix weird sounds when landing
- web mouse sensitivity
- push generation farther

source on github. see credits.
